name: The Witcher 3 | Interactive Bestiary
description:
-DETAILS-

A fully interactive Witcher 3 Bestiary, created by me and in: Unity 2018.1.6f.1 + Android Studio 4.0.1. As seen below, there are also links for an android .apk file to install on your Android device. Following the reddit post, there's a comment made by me that outlines recommendations for printing purposes. So the option is available if you wish to print this into a full book. This post encompasses access to the Interactive Bestiary, Android application, Bestiary in pdf form and details on how to print it.

-CONTROLS-

Point and Click.

Music player situated at the top right where songs can be skipped forward, backward, paused or stopped. Bottom right icon can switch out the scenery. Bottom left icon terminates the application.

-LINKS- 

  • Android APK File
  • Full Gdrive Link
  • Reddit Post

-FURTHER NOTES- 

Permission was granted to use the background scenery created and provided by Gaming Ambience. His channel can be accessed here. 

There are 15 Songs in the music player that repeat in a cycle with the interactive game; 

  • 1. A Nearly Peaceful Place
  • 2. For Honor! For Toussaint!
  • 3. Geralt of Rivia
  • 4. Hearts of Stone Theme 
  • 5. Kaer Morhen
  • 6. Ladies of the Wood
  • 7. Merchants of Novigrad
  • 8. On the Champs-Desoles 
  • 9. Steel for Humans 
  • 10. Sword of Destiny 
  • 11. The Fields of Ard Skellig 
  • 12. The Slopes of the Blessure 
  • 13. The Vagabond 
  • 14. The Wolven Storm
  • 15. Toss A Coin To Your Witcher
